data.text:
Less paper, less contact. Download our app so you can have your boarding pass where it's most useful. 

https://t.co/n0szbf5921 https://t.co/1poLmksl6x

We offer onboard WiFi and free messaging on our 737 MAX and many other aircraft. All so you can stay in touch no matter where you are. 
Learn more: https://t.co/KjN3KDRb6k https://t.co/yXynUbf2or

urls.title: Log in to Twitter / Twitter
urls.description: Log in to Twitter to see the latest. Join the conversation, follow accounts, see your Home Timeline, and catch up on Tweets from the people you know.

data.text: @davidchattaj ¡Hola, David! Lamentamos los inconvenientes ocasionados.Por favor comparte con nosotros por DM tu número de boleto y con gusto lo revisamos.  https://t.co/tUm35yBeYC *AA

#TogetherWeKeepFlying https://t.co/JuNbPFkkDT

data.text: @bmoy Hi @bmoy, we are very sorry too hear you had an unlpeasant experience, please share your reservation code and let us know what went wrong through DM *FA
Most of our 737 MAX are less than a year old (!). If you want to fly on the most advanced and fuel-efficient aircraft, fly with us. 😎 https://t.co/EQIhen1Rqq

@SoSoUnheard Case number 02250139 was received on January 31st, it is currently on queue waiting to be assigned to an excutive. Please know that our response time anywhere from 7 to 10 business days. We appreciate your patience. *GV

data.text: @SoSoUnheard We scale your folio again at this time and thus be able to give priority in the response to your request. *VP
@SoSoUnheard Hi! Please share your folio number with us through a DM so we can review the follow-up of your request. *VP

Don't miss your flight because you went to the wrong terminal! Make sure you know if you're flying from T1 or T2 of Mexico City International Airport. 

https://t.co/V5lvt7jPko https://t.co/pbu4noez8z

Guadalajara is a fantastic experience made all the better if you share it with someone you love. Check out our best deals.  
https://t.co/wuUtsWEWoc https://t.co/PYF2BVtvcz
@CoreyRobbins16 Your case is being followed up shortly you will receive a response from the executive in charge of your case. MA*
@VeronicaMichel Hello Veronica. Please share your case number by DM to validate the status. * VR
@eneidarevueltas Hi! Please tell us through a DM how we can assist you. *VP

Starting today, our flights to Culiacan (CUL), Mazatlan (MZT), and Minatitlan (MTT) are departing from Terminal 1 of Mexico City International Airport. 

Learn about areas of interest including how to transfer between terminals here: https://t.co/OuyNLe0bOP https://t.co/uM3JiFbQHb

data.text: We want to make your travel experience smoother 😉, that’s why we implemented the Digital Spine technology, developed by SkyTeam. data.text:
This lovely town is perhaps the most beautiful example of the colonial era of Mexico. Word of caution, you may never want to leave. Don’t let our Special Flight Sale deals pass you by. 
https://t.co/F1EnT2lEto https://t.co/hwmlSmyTb7

Find out for yourself how tasty Mondays can be. Book a flight to the land of delicious food. #MondayMotivation

https://t.co/OYZ5a7rBty https://t.co/QiajwPOhdf

data.text: @kcarbaj1998 Hi Kenia! Share us through a DM your reservation key and ticket number please. *VP
@doomraider1 Hi! Please share with us the ticket number by DM, we will gladly assist you. *AA  https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F

See the great rivers of Mexico. Tlacotalpan is one of the most mesmerizing towns in Mexico, completely undiscovered by the masses. We can take you there.

Learn more about Veracruz. https://t.co/LjiFOKbw2n https://t.co/l8MxTHyRBt

If you’ve never been to Edward James' Surrealist Garden in San Luis Potosi, now’s your best chance. If you have, then discover the rest of the state! Our Special Flight Sale is here.  
https://t.co/yta5uQQl95 https://t.co/Jirf23wGz2
@aguzmancarrasco Alejandra, please share with us your reservation code and your positive test result. *HS
@aguzmancarrasco We recommend that you delete your reservation code, please share your data with us in a private message. *GP
@aguzmancarrasco Hello! Please, contact us via Dm with your reservation code. *GP
@elnortej John, please share with us your reservation code. *HS

Get flight updates, trip extras, and even upgrades on the go with our app.

https://t.co/g714qv1hi8 https://t.co/NK7U2otWBn
@JeremyLSorensen Hi! Sorry for all the inconveniences. Please share with us by DM you reservation code, we will gladly verify what happened with the flight. *AA  https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F

A trip to Mexico City would start your year off with a bang! Don’t miss our Special Flight Sale deals.  
https://t.co/OpuKB6tBJf https://t.co/Od06ipogKC

data.text: @DorothyPS ¡Hola! Por favor, proporcionanos tu número de reserva vía DM. Quedamos a tus órdenes. *GP
Depending on your fare, you may be able to make changes to your flight. Learn about the applicable travel waiver here: https://t.co/Vfj5GXX9oC https://t.co/RgHBxfveQC

The Omicron variant of COVID-19 is affecting less of our flights every day. We ask that you please check if yours has been modified. 
https://t.co/xYJe4GCeJI https://t.co/sIGEyWMCjt

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: We have HEPA filters installed on every aircraft on every flight. They eliminate 99.99% of germs and viruses so you can fly with absolute confidence. Learn more about our safety measures here: https://t.co/EghPtVMIh9 https://t.co/viZutIeQAc

Plan your trip to Guadalajara today and take advantage of these great deals. Then, you can just fly when you’re ready.  
https://t.co/y28JBO2ycb https://t.co/eO4MWG5UIw
Book now, fly when you're ready. Your dream destination will be there for when you decide to go. 🛫 https://t.co/skvKBoo7KT

@alexandramu92 Hi. Thank you for contacting Aeroméxico. Please share with us by DM your reservation code or the ticket number. *AA 
 https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F
@arrobaSaraGa ¡Hola! Por favor comparte con nosotros por DM tu número de caso y con gusto lo verificamos. *AA ttps://twitter.com/messages/compose?recipient_id=50505691
@melliissuhh Hi! Share your reservation code and ticket number with us through a DM so we can review your itinerary, please. *VP

@whotfisfux Hello, we are sorry for the situation, please, share more details with us via DM, we will gladly assist you! *JF
 https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F
@CRLOSM_ Hello, please share with us through DM your reservation code. we will gladly verify it. *HS

@Pricill57954234 Hi. Thank you for contacting Aeroméxico. Please share with us by DM your reservation codes or the ticket numbers. *AA 
 https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F
@TalentHue Hi @TalentHue! Please share your voucher number through a DM, and we will review your information. **CL**
Breathe easy knowing we have HEPA filters installed in our 737 MAX and all of our aircraft as well. Learn more about our health and safety protocols: https://t.co/BiPPRhe5pM https://t.co/ENuD7VSR2z
@scrmuch Peter, through Dm share with us your reservation code. We will gladly verify it. *HS
@LindseyCA85 Hello, please through Dm share with us more details about the situation and your reservation code. *HS
It's as simple as following this link: https://t.co/L4hcoBgkGH 🛫 https://t.co/MQFd56RYej
@MayAllFeelPeace Hi May!  Please send the reservation code by DM and we will gladly verify it. *KR https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F

🚨If you received an email informing you of a modification to your flight, and it contains your reservation code and personal details, there’s no need to contact our Call Center. Follow the instructions and if you have any questions comment below:
@John_Sevigny Hello, John! Please, we ask you to have a respectful treatment. Give us your reservation code and positive test via DM, to validate options. *GP
@lizkhalifa Hi, Liz! Please contact us via WhatsApp or call 55 5133 4050 option 2 so that an executive can support you with the follow-up of your case.  *DA

data.text: @Luzma929 Luz, in this case for changes are only through our call center. Due the high volume of calls we are having long waiting times. Please do not hang up, one of our executives is going to assist you. *HS
@ingenierosaurio ¡Hola! Lamentamos la demora estamos trabajando para agilizar la operación. Compártenos tu clave de reservación vía DM por favor. MT
@LizEB13 Hi, Liz! Please share the details of your request via DM to find a way to support you. *DA

We apologize that some of our flights have been affected due to COVID-19. Nevertheless, our priority is that you arrive at your destination safely. 

We ask that you please read our flexibility policy: https://t.co/M1Elyn5dTk

urls.title: Restricciones y Requisitos de Viaje por país.
urls.description: ¿A dónde puedo Viajar?, Viaja informado y antes de comprar tu boleto, verifica cuál es la documentación requerida para volar e ingresar al país de destino.

data.text: @annacalla In the following link you can verify the information and documentation required to make your trip: https://t.co/xUtTQwkn9n We invite you to consult it. * VR

The current worldwide situation continues to pose problems which have led to the cancelation or delay of some of our flights. We are working to take you to your destination as soon as possible. 

Flexibility options if your flight has been affected: https://t.co/HX9YhZRl5v

It is of the utmost importance to us that you arrive at your destination on time. We apologize if your flight has been affected due to the new variant, Omicron. 

For this reason, we share our flexibility options so you can get home safely: https://t.co/2S6GncLmIB

data.text: @MikeRoseLA Hi, Mike! Please share your reservation code with Aeromexico and/or your ticket number via DM to locate the necessary information and help you with the details.*DA

Your safety is our top priority. Due to the recent surge in cases worldwide, we have implemented protocols that have affected some of our flights. We are doing everything we can to take you to your destination as quickly and as safely as possible. https://t.co/Zl7IYcXRnK https://t.co/Vx5ag56ReY

@CoreyRobbins16 Your case has been escalated, as soon as we get a response about your refund we will send you a message. Sorry for all the inconvenience. 
 *AA
@CoreyRobbins16 Hello, we are sorry in advance for the delay, we have already asked you to support us with the follow-up of your folio, you will receive a response as soon as possible. * GP
@AllegretIsa Hi @AllegretIsa! Please share trhough a DM your booking code, and we will review the situation. **CL**

Explore one of Mexico’s cultural capitals. If you’ve never been to Guadalajara or if you’ve been 100 times, our best deals can get you there.  
https://t.co/uvyQFYERH6 https://t.co/ZVCFjdwFxj
@singy Hello! Please provide us with your reservation number via DM. We are at your service. * GP
@citcuba Hello, we see that your case was open today. In this case the response time is up to 15 business days. *HS
@Andrew_Matkin Hi! Please share with us through DM your reservation code, we will gladly assist you. *AA  https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F
In 2021, we took some big steps towards making our flights greener. This new year, we're striving to continue flying further while lowering our CO2 emissions. https://t.co/o7aISi6Yon

@flaviobrino Hello, please, send a WhatsApp message to +5255 5133 4000 entering the word AYUDA, and provide the agent with your reservation code to follow up. WA League ES: https://t.co/2FDVaYaKg8 * GP
@heartsjanette Hola, a través de DM haznos llegar tu clave de reserva y el resultado positivo a COVID. Con gusto lo verificamos. *HS
@ang3l_zamarripa ¡Hola! Por favor, compártenos más detalles sobre lo ocurrido vía DM, no olvides anexar tu clave de reservación, por favor *GP
@andreskicdo Enter your username "Andres Caicedo" in WhatsApp and when you do, please tell us to transfer you to an agent. * GP
@andreskicdo Please write to 5551334000 the word help, an executive will support you with the follow-up, the hours of operation are from 8:00 am until 10:00 pm.  *MT
